aka: Manatí: Portrait of a Third-World Happy Town
this_title: Manatí, retablos de un pueblo subdesarrollado y feliz
trans_title: Manatí: Portrait of a Third-World Happy Town
introduction: This documentary is a historical portrait of Manati, a town of fishermen and peasants of the Colombian Caribbean Coast.
chinese_title: Manatí, retablos de un pueblo subdesarrollado y feliz
